@BrianMcHugh2011 @EnvAgency @10DowningStreet @hmtreasury @DefraGovUK Staff numbers have decreased by nearly 30% since the Conservatives came into power. This is a political and strategic failure in environmental regulation and management.

@BrianMcHugh2011 @EnvAgency @10DowningStreet @hmtreasury @DefraGovUK With great trepidation and concern. If the government does not accept its statutory responsibilities then we will face a bleak future.
